name: Sticks and Bones (itch) (Small Bug Games, CoByte, MetaphysicalMonsters)
name_original: Sticks and Bones (itch) (Small Bug Games, CoByte, MetaphysicalMonsters)
description:
Sticks and Bones

You wake up in a pool of blood in the center of a dark hostile forest. Your limbs are badly broken or missing and you can barely move. You can hear the sounds of terrible creatures in the distance. How do you get home?

Made in 72 (and a half) hours for Mini Jam 87! The theme was Break and the limitation was that the player is a pacifist. This was a collaboration between me, my sibling Meta and my best friend CoByte!

Credits

CoByte - Programming, Writing
SmallBugGames - Programming, Sound Design
MetaphysicalMonsters - Art

All sound effects from Freesound.com
